text: Andrzej Waldemar Korzyński (2 March 1940 – 18 April 2022) was a Polish composer. He worked with movie directors Andrzej Wajda and Andrzej Żuławski. His best known works were The Birch Wood, Man of Marble, The Devil and Possession. He was born in Warsaw, Poland."Andrzej Korzyński" . Filmpolski.pl - Internetowa Baza Filmu Polskiego (Polish Internet Movie Database). Państwowa Wyższa Szkoła Filmowa, Telewizyjna i Teatralna im. Leona Schillera w Łodzi (National Film, Television and Theatre School Leon Schiller in Łódź). Retrieved 2015-05-27. Korzyński died on 18 April 2022 at the age of 82.Nie żyje Andrzej Korzyński. Słynny kompozytor, twórca muzyki filmowej.
